What to Know About the Saint Ambrose Nursing School Application Form Portal

The Saint Ambrose Nursing School SANS Application portal is designed to accept application of candidates seeking for admission into the University. In the portal, applicant can Purchase application form, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slip, check admission list, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission in the SANS application portal, candidates must;

  • Have Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to SANS on/before 15 October 2025.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

Required Documents During Application | Saint Ambrose Nursing School

All applicants starting a new qualification must upload all the required documents, which generally consists of the following:

  • Copy of your school qualifications (eg Senior Certificate)
  • Copy of your official tertiary academic record(s) (if applicable) (internet copies will not be accepted)
  • Copy of your ID document (RSA students) or ID / passport (international students)
  • Copy of your marriage certificate (if applicable) or divorce decree (if applicable)
  • Sworn translations of documents if they are not in English or Afrikaans

How to Apply | SANS Application Form 2025

Eligible candidates can click here to apply.

Follow the steps below

  • Visit Application portal
  • Choose type of Application (Undergraduate, Post Graduate, Semester Studies)
  • Fill and complete all necessary pages
  • Pay Application fees where required

Applicants have to meet the requirements for admission into the Diploma as she is above 18 points 

  • There are limits to the number of students that can be admitted to each programme as this is dependent on the accredited capacity of the South African Nursing Council. Meeting the minimum requirements does not guarantee acceptance or automatic registration to the specified programme. Candidates will be required to undergo testing and interviews to screen candidates further.
  • Candidates in possession of health-related post matric experience/certificate will be registered as per the identified quota for that group as specified below:
    • Scholars: 50%
    • Candidates with pre-NSC Grade 12 certificate: 20%
    • Candidates with health-related post matric experience/certificate: 10%
    • Serving Officers: 20%
  • Please note that admission requirements are subject to change and the college:
      • will invest heavily in nurses for ECDoH facilities;
      • will not invest in candidates that have attempted other avenues for example dropped out of universities/technikons/colleges and;
      • will not invest in candidates that are in possession of other qualifications. Should this be discovered at any stage during the process, the candidate will be disqualified.

 

Saint Ambrose Nursing School Application Required Documents

To apply to SANS you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript
